anecdotes.content: Start your day with a smile and find quote of the day. Open your eyes and convince yourself that you will win the day. Give yourself a small tap at the back, love yourself a little more, compliment your good traits, and be the person your inner child wants you to be.
Today will be a great day, expect nothing less. Here are positive that will help you get through the day.
Today is your day. Your mountain is waiting so get on your way.- Dr. Seuss
Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose. â€“ Lyndon B. Johnson
When it rains, it pours? but soon, the sun shines again. Stay positive. Better days are on their way.
The 2022 edition has started! Despite the year is soon over you can start now since the course continues at 2023, see this for more details.
Just one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.
Also change the creation of a new anecdote to asynchronous actions implemented using the Redux Thunk library.
We have used the Redux-store with the help of the React Redux library 's hook app, i.e. the functions useSelector and useDispatch .
In new applications, you should definitely use hook-api , but knowing the connect function is useful when maintaining older projects that use Redux.
